Episode.summary: When SpongeBob and Patrick are communicating through bubbles, Squidward is preparing a cake for himself to eat. But he gets mad and decides to also communicate with bubbles, and insults them through the bubbles, making them break their friendship, so he later invites them to his house and SpongeBob and Patrick become friends again.
Episode.title: Naughty Nautical Neighbors

item.name: Sherm Cohen, Aaron Springer, Mr. Lawrence
